sec.title: Rigs for underground operation
sec.p: For rigs for underground operation, the following instructions shall be included:

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: instructions specifying that the area in front of the rig, i.e. between the carrier and the tunnel face, within the hazard zone, shall be a restricted access area when drilling;

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: information about the restricted access area and the residual risks within the restricted access area shall be provided;

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: instructions on how to use any hazard zone access detection system in the different operation modes;

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: instructions on how to complement any hazard zone access detection system if the rock wall is not limiting the hazard zone;

list-item.label: e)
list-item.p: instructions on how warning signs and lights shall be applied to the machine, forbidding the entry into the hazardous area close to the drill string;

list-item.label: f)
list-item.p: instructions and drawings showing the hazardous area in the instruction manual in order to require to the work site organisation to provide fences or barrier around the hazard area;

list-item.label: g)
list-item.p: instructions for working from boom-mounted platforms;

list-item.label: h)
list-item.p: instructions on how to place the booms to negotiate narrow paths, taking the sweep radius of the booms into account.
